title: Michael Zezas: Oil Exporter Tensions Add to Market Worries
description: The dual challenges of the coronavirus and the collapse of the OPEC plus arrangement intensifies the need for a fiscal response from Washington. Head of Public Policy Research Michael Zezas explains.
